title: The Team
text:
Lavin Consulting Services is a 100% women-owned firm, backed by a team with over 12 years of combined experience in business administration and financial management. Our expertise spans government service platforms, including E-Citizen, KRA eTIMS, and both old and new statutory obligations, ensuring seamless compliance and efficiency for businesses.

Our team is composed of highly skilled professionals, including a Certified Public Accountant (CPA-K), a digital marketing expert, a seasoned business administrator, and other specialists dedicated to delivering top-tier financial, administrative, and digital solutions. Whether youâ€™re an individual or a growing business, Lavin Consulting Services is your trusted partner for streamlined operations and long-term success.
